sentences.english: So now is a good time to take stock of IT’s most hated power couple.
sentences.chinese: 因此现在是清查这对最被痛恨的组合的好时机。

sentences.english: P.S. The irony is that I hate mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 讽刺的是我痛恨移动电话。

sentences.english: But disguise of every sort is my abhorrence.
sentences.chinese: 可惜无论是什么样的装假，我都痛恨。

sentences.english: Based on my extensive observations of the species, Apple-haters fall into five categories.
sentences.chinese: 基于我本人的广泛观察，苹果痛恨者可以分成五大类。

sentences.english: He abhors the idea but he considers it a necessary evil.
sentences.chinese: 他痛恨这种想法，但又认为这种恶行是必要的。

sentences.english: One shouldn't be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.
sentences.chinese: 做人不能太势利眼了，嫌贫爱富的人让人痛恨。

sentences.english: Is this a goodreason to hate Apple?
sentences.chinese: 这是一个痛恨苹果的理由吗？

sentences.english: Is this a goodreason to hate Apple? Well, half-and-half.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个痛恨苹果的好理由吗？

sentences.english: He detests the woman who abandoned him.
sentences.chinese: 他痛恨那个抛弃他的女人。

sentences.english: He hated society and had little desire to go out and see the world again.
sentences.chinese: 他痛恨社会，不再想出去见世面了。

sentences.english: She hates bitterly most of be eat in pick outside hired, these folk must severely penalize.
sentences.chinese: 她最痛恨的就是吃里扒外的员工，这些人必须严惩。

sentences.english: There must be someone you hate bitterly, aren't there?
sentences.chinese: 你一定有一个切齿痛恨的人吧？

sentences.english: Gessler ruled over Switzerland. The Swiss people hated him.
sentences.chinese: 盖斯勒统治着瑞士，瑞士人都痛恨他。

sentences.english: The Chinese citizen felt strongly against the ineptness of the government.
sentences.chinese: 中国老百姓强烈地痛恨政府的无能。

definition: to loathe/to hate/to abhor/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 e4]
to hate evil/see also 憎惡|憎恶[zeng1 wu4]
to hate sb to the bone (idiom)
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
